content:
Diagnosis:	Grade II diffuse astrocytoma (IDH mutant) right frontal lobe

Management:	15 Jan 2023 Subtotal resection
		02 Mar 2023 - 15 Apr 2023 Radiotherapy 54Gy in 30#

Current situation:	Routine surveillance

[redacted name] attended for routine follow-up today. She remains clinically stable with no new neurological symptoms. Her most recent MRI from 15/5/24 shows post-treatment changes with no evidence of disease progression. She continues to manage well with levetiracetam 750mg BD with no seizures for 6 months. Her performance status remains 0 and she has returned to work full-time. Steroid dose has been successfully weaned and stopped. Plan for continued 3-monthly MRI surveillance with next scan due August 2024. Will review in clinic with scan results.

cancer_timeline.value: MRI shows post-treatment changes with no evidence of disease progression

status_updates.value: Grade II diffuse astrocytoma treated with surgery and radiotherapy. Clinically stable with no evidence of progression on surveillance imaging
Steroid dose successfully weaned and stopped
3-monthly MRI surveillance with next scan due August 2024
Review in clinic with scan results
